person.persName: Isaac Clay Smith (Oldham County, Kentucky, student and farmer)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, student and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Isaac R. Smith and Matilda Clore Smith. Married to Elizabeth C. Wade Smith. Father of Ada Bertie Smith and Mary M. Smith. Resident of Oldham County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned twenty-two enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1850. Farmer in Oldham County in 1860. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1860.
